section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on August 3, 2023.*

*NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on July 23, 2023. To view the text of this section after the expiration of the emergency legislation, click this link: Temporary Law Section.*
section.heading: Rulemaking.
section.text: If the Mayor establishes an office pursuant to § 4-773.01, the Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter, which shall include the eligibility and termination criteria required by § 4-773.01.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (225 days) creation of § 4-773.06, see § 106 of Migrant Services and Supports Temporary Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-234, Dec. 21, 2022, 69 DCR 13991).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 106 of Migrant Services and Supports Temporary Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-234, Dec. 21, 2022, 69 DCR 13991).
